column4: it's her husbands computer. the user is named differently. and you don't really know if there is not already a directory named /home/old. so don't advice her to do this. she can just try to log in with a new user
it can be named anything, /home/old is not required
yep. but she does not understand the command. so she cannot modify it approprieately. besides all of the command require sudo and are dangerous if are mistyped or misunderstood
thats why you dont run commands that you dont understand
